name: DE:VO/D
description:
The girl wake up only to find herself trapped inside a world of many doors. Lacking memories and purpose, the girl struggle  to find out who is she really are.
Can you help her lead the way and face the truth beneath?

NOTE: This is a demo prototype of the game. It reflects an early development cycle and you can expect changes and improvements to a final version. This version will have some bugs which we will work to fix as soon as possible.
